lines.text: The thing I hate about you, Rowntree, is the way you give Coca-Cola to your scum, and your best teddy bear to Oxfam, and expect us to lick your frigid fingers for the rest of your frigid life.
One man can change the world with a bullet in the right place.
There's only one thing you can do with a girl like this. Walk naked into the sea together as the sun sets. Make love once... Then die.
Anyway, this homosexual flirtatiousness is so adolescent!
What's the matter Denson... aren't you keen?
There's no such thing as a wrong war. Violence and revolution are the only pure acts.
Go on. Look at me. Look at my eyes. I'll kill you. Sometimes I stand in front of the mirror and my eyes get bigger and bigger. And I'm like a tiger. I like tigers. Rrrrah!
Paradise is for the blessed. Not for the sex-obsessed.
When do we live? That's what I want to know.

[whispering]
Stephans. Whatever you're doing now... don't.
The whole world will end very soon - black, brittle bodies peeling into ash...
War is the last possible creative act.
What stands, if freedom falls? Who dies, if England lives?
Those who are given most also have most to give.
I don't see what difference the speed makes... the speed of the nail...
